values.value: Transimplant Surgery (Headware, Bodyware, Organic Replacements), Organ Culture (by organ or limb), Replacement Construction (by organ or limb), Extended Care, First Aid

Biotech Skill governs basic medicine, first aid, and implant operations. A character with this skill understands basic medicine in a hands-on sense, as a paramedic rather than a physician. Though familiar with the techniques and materials of cyberware, a character with this skill would still need a computer expert to collaborate on the interface systems.
